title: # Code snippets `that start with an x` for the [(ABP framework)](https://abp.io/)
animated_gif: ![ABPx in Action!](images/abpx_in_action.gif "ABPx - Code snippets that start with an 'x' - in Action!")
create_issue: Do you see room for improvement or do you have a snippet in mind you want to have included? Feel free to [create an issue](https://github.com/bartvanhoey/ABPx/issues/new), I will see what I can do!
